title: Reply To Forgiveness Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Reply To Forgiveness Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Reply To Forgiveness Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 197
items.transliteration: AAabdullah Ibn Sarjis  said: ‘I went to see the Prophet  and ate from his food and then said to him:(Ghafaral-lahu laka ya rasoolal-lah.) he  replied: (wa-lak)
items.translation: AAabdullah Ibn Sarjis  said: ‘I went to see the Prophet  and ate from his food and then said to him: (May Allah forgive you, O Messenger of Allah.) he  replied: (and you.)

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء لـ
